name: O.O.C Disco Party
description:
On a remote and distant floating piece of ice..
a group of penguins are bringing sexy back.
!join the party in order to grab control of one of them, perform a unique sequence of dance moves and be the first to !id(entify) your own! 

Commands : 
This are the available commands you can type in Twitch Chat to play the game

!join - Join the game

!id "id number" - the id of the pinguin that you think you are

!tw - twist dance move

!jp - jump move

!mu - move up

!md - move down

!ml - move left

!mr - move right
